title: BMS Organics - Be Lohas Healthy Cuisine - Jalan Radin Bagus
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Organic, Western, Asian, Malaysian
description: An all-organic cafe uses no dairy; instead uses soy milk. All meals with egg are clearly marked. Garlic and onion are an option for any dish. Plenty of vegan options are available. Try the nasi lemak. Sells organic products for daily use. Multiple locations.
